scenes.background: Monica looks around, tapping her pen nervously.
scenes.description: 'We can't keep delaying. Bob, why are you always so hesitant?'

options.text: Maybe Bob has valid concerns. What if we try to address them quickly?
options.analysis: You recognize Bob's concerns and suggest a quick resolution, showing good perception and empathy.

options.text: Monica, rushing isn't the solution. We need to be thorough to avoid mistakes.
options.analysis: You emphasize the importance of being thorough, showing good self-regulation and motivation to avoid potential mistakes.

options.text: Bob, maybe you are overthinking. A bit of risk-taking could be beneficial.
options.analysis: You suggest that Bob is overthinking, indicating good perception but lower empathy towards his cautious approach.
